repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits.

summary.p: Various notes by Édouard Ariel, on Indian sciences mostly, but also on other topics.

Various papers and quires of various format bound in one volume: notes, extracts of books copied, lists of vocabulary, dialogues in French translated into Tamil, etc. Subject-headers of top right of rectos.

The volume contains:
f1-f2: Inde. mathématiques..
f3-f16: mesures hindoues.
f17-f18: mesures monnaies.
f19: TBC.
f20-f21: letter (dated 1818) in French to the president of the "Tribunal de la Chaudrie" by residents of Mahé.
f22-f23: letter (dated 1843) in French to the chief administrator of Mahé by residents of Mahé.
f24: list of Tamil vocabulary.
f25-f27: list of plants (under their Indian names) and their properties.
f28-f29: list of vocabulary in English, Tulu, Coorg, Toda.
f30-f34: list of Toda vocabulary.
f35: list of Booroo vocabulary.
f36-f41: list of vocabulary (Glossary of terms which occur in this volume ).
f42: letter in French.
f43: TBC.
f44: Nāgarī characters taken form an inscription from Karnataka.
f45: TBC.
f46-f48: biography of Beschi in Tamil.
f49-f56: navamāṉa cētikaḷ. List of events from 1505 to 1849.
f57: title page Divers Vocabulaires ou Recueils .
f58-f67: Nomenclature des comestibles en usage parmi les indiens & des denrées qu’ils consomment. List of Tamil vocabulary.
f68: Instruments aratoires suivant l’arrêté.
f69: Grains divers.
f70-72: Explication de plusieurs mots bengali en Français par lettres alphabétiques. Bilingual list in Bengali (transcribed) and French.
f73-76: Termes grammaticaux. French and Telugu translations.
f77: Termes de droit. French and Telugu translations.
f78: document in Tamil (1848).
f79-108: list of vocabulary.
f109-f162: dialogues in French with (incomplete) Tamil translation (f109-f118), followed by a list of vocabulary in French with (incomplete) Tamil translation (f119-f162).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (November 2019).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Autograph work by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
